t:
I stood on the beach with my family, the water splashing my feet.
These vacations were the only glimpse of happiness in my lonesome life.

                        *BEEP*
‘Simulation Ended’, flashed before my eyes as my family vanished and the dingy cell reappeared around me.
c:
Which simulation are you living?


#Collab and share what in your life happened #onceagain #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba



#simulation #virtuallife #virtualworld #beach #ocean
